summary: All of the Dawn mods in a single .esp
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffd966][b][size=5]Grab the Director's Cut [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77794/?]here[/url]!
[/size][/b][/color]
[youtube]br37Li66eXY[/youtube]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2zffr9e.jpg[/img]
[size=6][b][color=#f1c232]Dragonborn Required[/color][/b][/size]

[b][i][size=4][color=#6d9eeb]All FIVE major cities in a single .esp[/color][/size][/i][/b]

[b]If you are switching to this single .esp version, please make sure that you uninstall the individual cities. This mod is NOT compatible with them (for obvious reasons)

[color=#f1c232][i]If you are updating and are having issues, please deactivate the mod, make a clean save, and reactivate.[/i][/color]
[color=#6d9eeb][i]If you are installing for the first time on an existing save, items in Solitude may not update.  This is a limitation of the game engine.  Please use the pcb command to reset the cells.[/i][/color]
[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58810/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/FslOzx0.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58288/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/9GknPkF.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58275/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D58275&pUp=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/HqPDlRQ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58303/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/baq5z3L.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58330/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/q3YTEkV.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58275/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D58275&pUp=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/JDgHxy2.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58275/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D58275&pUp=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/Z3RmaTU.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58602/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/1CO2UDd.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58275/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D58275&pUp=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/SZLYoof.png[/img][/url]

[color=#ffd966][b]In regards to performance:[/b] My city overhauls are generally not performance heavy on their own.  Your fps drop will depend on your rig and what other mods you are running.  Your performance will likely vary from city to city, as it does in vanilla.  I will not be answering questions about performance.[/color]

[color=#6d9eeb]Please see the individual mod pages for specific compatibilty.  [b]In general, the Collection is fully compatible with the following popular mods (please note that this is not a complete list):[/b] [color=#ffffff][i]Wet & Cold Holidays, Nernie's City Expansion, Open Cities (follow link above for patch), JK's Cities (please use compatibility patch provided)[/i][/color][/color][i], all city retextures including the Sexy series, Interesting NPCs, Inconsequential NPCs, Cutting Room Floor[/i]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/feUgsQ5.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37460/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/a39LExJ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43701/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/7ZWD7jF.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50336/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/5rabo8J.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58110/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/i2Vd2sQ.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58151/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/gJ5xK1e.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/feUgsQ5.png[/img]
[b][size=4]
Recommend mods[/size][/b]
[i][b][color=#f1c232]To achieve the look in the screenshots[/color][/b][/i]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/]Vurt's Flora Overhaul[/url] :: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38491/?]aMidianBorn Whiterun[/url] :: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26269/?]Langley's Texture Workshop[/url] :: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13429/?]Designs of the Nords[/url] :: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29608]Detailed Rugs[/url] :: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57578/?]Signs of Skyrim[/url] :: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29673/?]Nord Cattle[/url] :: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url] (+ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799/?]Weather Patch[/url]) :: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36067]Vividian ENB[/url] :: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22707/?]Grace Darkling's Clutter Pack[/url]

[size=5]Permission Notes[/size]
[b]None of my mods or their assets may be redistributed or utilized in other mods in any
circumstance, paid or free.  My mods are exclusive to the nexus and my
tumblr, when applicable.  If you see them elsewhere, including the steam
workshop, they are stolen and I will not condone or support these
versions.

Authorized translations will always be linked in the description and some of these may be hosted on other sites as per my and
the translator's discretion.[/b][/center]
author: BluePianoTwo

files.name: Dawn of Skyrim v1
files.changelogHtml:
(Released September 19th, 2014)
- Initial release.
- Whiterun v1.5, Windhelm v1.2, Riften v1.1, Solitude v1.1, Markarth v1

files.name: Korean Translation
files.changelogHtml:
(Released September 19th, 2014)
- Initial release.
- Whiterun v1.5, Windhelm v1.2, Riften v1.1, Solitude v1.1, Markarth v1

files.name: Dawn of Skyrim Collection 1.1 Imperial
files.changelogHtml:
(Released September 25th, 2014)
- Two versions now available (standard and imperial to reflect Windhelm)
- Included: Whiterun 1.5, Windhelm 1.3, Riften 1.1, Solitude 1.1, Markarth 1

files.name: Dawn of Skyrim Collection 1.2
files.changelogHtml:
(Released October 3rd, 20140
- Imperial and Standard editions now consolidated per Windhelm update
- Included: Whiterun 1.5, Windhelm 1.4, Riften 1.1, Solitude 1.1, Markarth 1
